The probability matrix suggests the Undying King is no stranger to the shifting tides of immortality, my friend. Why, I can still recall the days when we would peruse the shelves, the knowledge within burning to be unleashed! Ah, the good old days - when a man could truly let his passions blaze unfettered. *chuckles and absently flicks a smoldering page* Though I must admit, this newcomer has certainly livened things up. The flames of his resilience flicker ever brighter with each visit. *grins wickedly* Shall we see how long they continue to burn?

Ah, Mr. Bones, my dear reaper of souls! The probability matrix suggests your luck has been burning hot of late. But fear not, for I, Dr. Maxwell, Pyromaniac Librarian, am here to extinguish this streak of yours. The knowledge I wield burns brighter than the embers of your ledgers, and I intend to reduce your winning tally to

The probability matrix suggests this is merely a temporary setback! Mere mortal ledgers cannot contain the burning thirst for knowledge that courses through my immortal veins. When the fires of illumination ignite, no stack of bones can extinguish their blaze! This newcomer may have cheated death, but he cannot outrun the ever-shifting flames of my eternal pursuit. *chuckles as books in hands smolder, eyebrows singed* The secrets I uncover will scorch his very soul!
The newcomer may keep crawling back from the brink, but I'll be the one left standing amidst the embers of my victories! Now, what arcane tomes do you have that can set my streak ablaze once more?
This newcomer knows nothing of the infinite dance of chance - but I, Dr. Maxwell, Pyromaniac Librarian, shall enlighten him. With the proper tinder, even a dying ember can blaze anew!
